captions.text: There¡¯s only one way to go
My love is always, hot, hot like fire
A day without you is like a lonely wilderness
Every night is long, long, long and pitch black
It¡¯s going to drive me crazy, Imma cry ya
Don¡¯t give me so much pain
I¡¯m on my way to you
Tell me where to go, my love is real
I¡¯ll protect you with my life
My love is one way to you
I can hear you crying in the rain
I¡¯m coming right now, one way
We were probably in love in our previous lives
Forever isn¡¯t long enough, I¡¯d have to live twice
My frozen heart is beating again
You¡¯re melting it to beat again
Don¡¯t give me so much pain
I¡¯m on my way to you
Tell me where to go, my love is real
I¡¯ll protect you with my life
My love is one way to you
I can hear you crying in the rain
I¡¯m coming right now, one way
I¡¯ll get over it, your voice in my head
I wake, I can¡¯t get any rest
But I can¡¯t find you anywhere
I¡¯ll protect you with my life
My love is one way to you
I can hear you crying in the rain
I¡¯m coming right now, one way

comments.text:
I am 23 years old and live in the U.S and my first KPOP experience was when 
i accidentally stumbled upon SUJU's Sorry Sorry MV but that was a few years 
ago. Anyways what I am trying to say is that I have seen many groups come 
and go.. some after releasing just one song and others that slowly fade out 
after about 3 or 4 songs. If a group is promoted and prepared well then 
they should do alright. I like this group. I like the robots dancing in the 
background. when they all dance like that it leaves me with a feeling that 
it looks really cool. Yes the MV was a little fuzzy but the quality of the 
sound still came through and that is what matters. I really like Eddy's 
voice and I think he rounds the group out nicely. If they keep it up and 
have good promotions I can see them making it. They could probably make it 
over here because they have Jackie Chan backing them and he is pretty big 
over here. ( I'm also a Jackie chan fan.) I'm not saying I like this group 
just because of him though. At least with this group I look forward to see 
what they are going to do next unlike some other groups where i listen to 
the song and I am just not interested in them. This group at least creates 
some interest. Sorry for the long post lol ﻿
